name: wenku10
tagline: A versatile book reader that does many things
body:
## wenku10 is...

### A text reader with bookmarks
bookmarks!

### A Spider that grab webpages into books
With the powerful spider embedded, you can grab mostly any page on the internet.

### An Experiment
Whenever I have new ideas, I will try to deliver it via wenku10 first. Design, concept, this is the ultimate playground for experiment!

### Authors and Contributors
wenku10 is proudly created by 斟酌 鵬兄 (@tgckpg) with collaborators binotaLiu (@binotaLiu) and ershiwo (@ershiwo).

### Having issues with wenku10?
If you are a use, file an issue in [github](https://github.com/tgckpg/wenku10/issues) or [bugzilla](https://bugzilla.astropenguin.net/describecomponents.cgi?product=wenku8%20uwp)(Chinese).

If you are a C# programmer, clone the project an create merge request!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
